name: kiwi-bundle
description: A simple and clean TypeScript environment for all your cross-platform applications
author: Nazim Lachter <nazim@blueforest.cc>

scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'Major upgrade from ${npm_package_version} to %s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'Minor upgrade from ${npm_package_version} to %s'
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'Patch upgrade from ${npm_package_version} to %s'
scripts.postversion: git push --follow-tags && echo '=> You can now run `npm publish`'
